title: Furnished Private Unit For Rent Near UIC/Tri-Taylor/Rush
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE AUGUST 1ST!!', 'Great Location on Quiet Cul-de-sac street and Taylor Street.', 'Very Charming and Bright Unit.', 'Walking Distance to the Near UIC/Tri-Taylor/Rush Medical Center.', 'This unit is optimal for students and post-graduates due to its proximity to UIC campus', 'Furnished private unit for rent is near the UIC/Tri-Taylor/Rush area.', 'The rent starts @ $600 including utilities.', 'One month security deposit.', 'Shared bathroom and kitchen area.', 'Utilities Included: Water, Gas, Electricity, Internet, Sewer, Trash, & Laundry', 'Features Include: In-Unit Shared Washer & Dryer, Central Heat, Tall Ceilings w/Recessed Can Lighting, Storage Room, Oven w/ Separate Electric Stove top, Refrig, Dishwasher & MW.', 'Furnished rooms with desk, chair, closet, lamp.', 'APPLY NOW', '$55 non-refundable application and background check fee:', '-Applications will be evaluated based on credit history, verifiable household income, rental history, eviction/foreclosure history, references.', '-No registered sex offenders or persons under a current child sex offender residency restriction.', ' Applicants have the right to dispute inaccuracies relevant to criminal history and provide evidence of rehabilitation and/or mitigating factors.', 'Unit subject to availability.']
